<denchmark-h:h5>System information (version)</denchmark-h>
 
 
 OpenCV => master
 Operating System / Platform => Windows 10 64 Bit
 Compiler => mingw64
 
 <denchmark-h:h5>Steps to reproduce</denchmark-h>
 
 <denchmark-code>// 3x3 should be small enough ...
 Mat src(3,3,CV_32F, 0.0), evec, eval;
 eigenNonSymmetric(src, evec, eval);
 </denchmark-code>
 
 this instead returns properly:
 <denchmark-code>Mat src(3,3,CV_32F, 0.5), evec, eval;
 eigenNonSymmetric(src, evec, eval);
 </denchmark-code>
